lombok.installer

Class IdeFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • lombok.installer.IdeFinder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EclipseFinder

    public abstract class IdeFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Implement and provide this class to add auto-finding a certain brand of IDEs to the lombok installer.

    • Method Detail

      • getDrivesOnWindows

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDrivesOnWindows()
                                                           throws java.lang.Throwable
        Returns all drive letters on windows that represent fixed disks. Floppy drives, optical drives, USB sticks, and network drives should all be excluded.
        Returns:
        A List of drive letters, such as ["C", "D", "X"].
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • getOS

        public static IdeFinder.OS getOS()

      • findIdes

        public abstract void findIdes(java.util.List<IdeLocation> locations,
                              java.util.List<CorruptedIdeLocationException> problems)
        Look for installations of your IDE in the usual places.
        Parameters:
        locations - Add to this list any valid locations that you found.
        problems - Add to this list any locations that look like installations, but have problems that prevent you from installing/uninstalling from them. DONT add to this list any common locations that have no installation at all - only add near misses.
